title: MD
biography: Sheikh Saud bin Rashid Al Mualla is the ruler and head of state of the Emirate of Umm Al Quwain since 2009 and a member of the Federal Supreme Council of the United Arab Emirates.
aiSummary: Humaid Al Shamsi is a oncology specialist with an H-index of 23 at Burjeel Cancer Institute (Member). Has been published in JAMA Oncology, ecancermedicalscience. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
